CarePlanTemplateGoal.name: CarePlanTemplateGoal
CarePlanTemplateGoal.description: Represents a junction between a care plan template and a goal definition. This object stores the goal details of a care plan template.

CarePlanTemplateId.description: The care plan template associated with the care plan template goal.

GoalDefinitionId.description: The goal definition associated with the care plan template goal.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the care plan template goal.

Priority.description: Specifies the priority of the care plan template goal.
